name: Panda:Eats,Shoots and Leaves
description:
Transform into a panda in 'Panda: Eats, Shoots and Leaves'!
Dive into lively mud water gun fights with other pandas, leveraging VR's innovative motion to effortlessly navigate amusement rides, from roller coasters to trampolines. This exuberant mud battle offers opportunities to bond with new friends and create joyous, memorable experiences!

Move in VR,

Experience a unique VR movement mode，parkour using your intuitive locomotion

Run,climb and chase

Glide effortlessly between trees and platforms, relishing the thrill of the chase alongside fellow pandas.

Enjoy funny rides

Enjoy a variety of exhilarating rides: feel the rush of speed on roller coasters, the exhilaration of weightlessness on trampolines, and more!

Shoot in a mud battle

Plunge into mud battles, aiming and firing to score, turning other pandas into muddy ones!

Meets friends!

Enjoy frolic and romp to your heart, savore the joy of social interaction.


Join the fun-filled jamboree now！
